beer.beer_description:
For the science bit: The use of AHP achieves higher yields and more efficient brewing processes. Such concentrated extracts preserve a full spectrum of aromatic oils and compounds, delivering brighter hop flavour and aroma with improved stability and reduced oxidation.

For the flavour bit: The fourth and final beer of our series utilises a dry hop of 100% Motueka Hop Kief. Motueka Hop Kief is a highly concentrated hop oil extract from Freestyle Farms in New Zealand. Motueka Hop Kief sparkling, distinct notes of lemon, lime and papaya with a hint of stonefruit.

For the science bit: The use of AHP achieves higher yields and more efficient brewing processes. Such concentrated extracts preserve a full spectrum of aromatic oils and compounds, delivering brighter hop flavour and aroma with improved stability and reduced oxidation.

For the flavour bit: The fourth and final beer of our series utilises a dry hop of 100% Motueka Hop Kief. Motueka Hop Kief is a highly concentrated hop oil extract from Freestyle Farms in New Zealand. Motueka Hop Kief sparkling, distinct notes of lemon, lime and papaya with a hint of stonefruit.

items.checkin_comment: Unsurprisingly the Motueka shines bright. Great sweet citrus and lime candy, juicy tropicals, slight green teeps. Kumi loves it

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 490 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 99!

items.checkin_comment:
Guava nose.
Melon and stonefruit flavours.
Softened mouthfeel 
Hint of lime late.
